meanings.definition: Spartinas: a genus of grasses commonly found in salt marshes.
meanings.sent1: The spartinas swayed gently in the breeze near the marsh.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the different types of spartinas that grow in salty areas.
meanings.sent3: The spartinas in the marsh had a party and invited all the other plants.
meanings.sent4: The spartinas stood tall like soldiers guarding the edge of the marsh.
meanings.sent5: The spartinas painted the marsh with a beautiful shade of green.

meanings.definition: Spartinas: the plural form of the word 'spartina', referring to multiple species of grasses in the genus Spartina.
meanings.sent1: We saw various spartinas growing together in the wetlands.
meanings.sent2: The spartinas in the field provided a habitat for many creatures.
meanings.sent3: The spartinas decided to throw a party to celebrate their diversity.
meanings.sent4: The spartinas danced in the wind, creating a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent5: The spartinas whispered secrets to each other in the gentle marsh breeze.
